013package org.apache.juneau;
014
015/**
016 * Defines extended language-specific metadata associated with a bean.
017 *
018 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
019 * </ul>
020 */
021public class ExtendedBeanMeta extends ExtendedMeta {
022
023   private final BeanMeta<?> bm;
024
025   /**
026    * Constructor.
027    *
028    * @param bm The metadata of the bean we're extending.
029    * @throws BeanRuntimeException If any error occurred trying to construct the metadata.
030    */
031   public ExtendedBeanMeta(BeanMeta<?> bm) throws BeanRuntimeException {
032      this.bm = bm;
033   }
034
035   /**
036    * Returns the bean metadata that was passed into the constructor.
037    *
038    * @return The bean metadata that was passed into the constructor.
039    */
040   protected BeanMeta<?> getBeanMeta() {
041      return bm;
042   }
043}
